description:
Cranborne; CANOPY ESTATE: This beautifully presented Carlisle home has been built with all the creature comforts in mind. As you walk through the front entry way you are in awe of it design and presentation. With upgraded features such as high ceiling, wide entry way, quality fixtures, fittings and the beautiful laminate floorboards adds to the ambiance of this home.

Comprising of five bedrooms, three bathrooms and multiple living areas this home is ideal for the growing family.
From the front entry way on the left, you have the spacious study/living space from there you are led to the open meals, family room overlooking the expansive alfresco area. This home offers
sprawling space and luxury for you to enjoy.

The well-appointed modern kitchen comes with stainless steel appliances, microwave cavity, loads of cupboard and bench space and a walk-in pantry. This kitchen is sure to impress any chef in the home.

The generous Master bedroom comes complete with two walk-in-robe and full ensuite featuring stone benchtops with twin vanities. You can step out to the private balcony where you can relax and enjoy the surrounding landscape. The additional three bedrooms upstairs come with built in robes. The main bathroom comes with a bathtub, generous shower, and separate toilet.
This home is complimented with an additional master bedroom with ensuite and wall in robe downstairs, ideal for guest to stay over or teenagers to have their own space.

The main features of the property.
- Built by Carlisle home
- Built in 2022
- Land size approx. 392 SQM
- 5 bedrooms
- Study/Living
- 3 bathrooms
- Powder room
- Master with walk in robe and built-in robe
- Ensuite

- Balcony

- BIR
- Family room
- Dining room
- Rumpus upstairs

- Linen cupboard
- Laundry

- High ceilings
- Laminate floorboards
- Kitchen with stainless steel appliances
- Microwave cavity
- Walk in pantry
- Double glazed windows downstairs
- Blinds
- Under staircase storage
- Internal access from double car garage
Ducted Heating; Yes
Evaporative Cooling: Yes

Dishwasher: Yes


- Chattels: All Fittings and Fixtures as Inspected as Permanent Nature
- Deposit Terms: 10% of Purchase Price
- Preferred Settlement: 30/45/60 Days

This lovely abode is in one of the most peaceful suburbs and close to all the amenities:
- Schools
- Kindergartens
- Parks
- Restaurants/Cafes
- Cranbourne Vikings Sports Centre
- Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre
- Springhill Shopping Centre
- Thompson Parkway Shopping Centre
- Cranbourne Homemaker Centre
- Medical Centres
- Bus Stop
- Merinda Park Train Station
- Cranbourne Train Station
This property is sure to sell soon so do not miss your chance to make this dream home yours! Call Hardeep Singh today to book an inspection.

PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN HOMES
Every care has been taking to verify the accuracy of the details in this advertisement, however we cannot guarantee its correctness. Prospective purchasers are required to take such action as is necessary to satisfy themselves of any pertinent matter.
